const PlantInfo = ({ plant }) => { const sensorData = plant.sensorData || {}; const careValues = plant.careValues || {}; const moistureLevel = careValues.moistureLevel ?? sensorData.moistureLevel ?? 50; const lightLevel = careValues.lightLevel ?? sensorData.lightLevel ?? 60; const nitrogenLevel = careValues.npkNitrogen ?? sensorData.npkNitrogen ?? 40; const phosphorusLevel = careValues.npkPhosphorus ?? sensorData.npkPhosphorus ?? 30; const potassiumLevel = careValues.npkPotassium ?? sensorData.npkPotassium ?? 20; const temperature = careValues.temperature ?? sensorData.temperature ?? 25; return (

}
